inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient first developed seizures at age 13...

inclusion.criterion: Normal neurological development until onset of epilepsy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Onset of epilepsy between ages of 5 and 18 years
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient first developed seizures at age 13...

inclusion.criterion: Seizure frequency of ≥2 seizures per month
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Presence of microfilaria in skin snip and/or antibodies against Ov16
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known or suspected allergy to Ivermectin
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Epilepsy with known cause (e.g. severe head trauma, perinatal asphyxia, patients with a history of cerebral malaria, meningitis or encephalitis)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41 year old man with history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
